rules_text:
Each nontoken creature you control gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control with the same name as that creature.
{3}{W}: Target creature's name becomes the creature card name of your choice. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Create X tokens that are copies of target creature or planeswalker.
The “legend rule” doesn't apply to permanents you control for the rest of the game.
Exile “SoulSync”.
